ourwork2.description: Sensesec is for organizations who want to set up their own IoT network infrastructure and run it in a secure and cost effective way on their own servers.
SenseSec is especially targeted towards organizations who have high demands on security
SenseSec is designed for being integrated into organization's existing IT landscape.
SenseSec is designed to manage IoT networks regardless of underlying technology like LoRa, Zigbee, Wifi, Blutooth etc.
